title: Automated Item-Generation and Validation
description: I created a web application for automatically generating psychometric items via LLM. Embedding of the generated items are then created with sBERT. Afterwards, cosine similarity between items can be calculated and visualized and pseudo-factor analysis is employed to identify items that negatively affect factor structure.

title: Briefing Automation for Job Analysis
description: I created a prototype for an app that automatically transcribes voice recordings of client briefings in the context of job analysis for specific job roles. The transcript is subsequently cleaned, summarized & structured by a LLM and can then be exported to Word.
